searchString.title: Search
searchString.description: String will be search on Google maps.

lat.title: Viewport Latitude
lat.description: Use it with combination with longitude and zoom to set up viewport to search on.

lng.title: Viewport Longitude
lng.description: Use it with combination with latitude and zoom to set up viewport to search on.

zoom.title: Viewport Zoom
zoom.description: Use it with combination with longitude and latitude to set up viewport to search on.
